Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Crypto/UHF/c/inc/UHF_Sender.h line 216 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Crypto/UHF/c/test/swut/UHF_Sender.c.test line 171

sect2.title: SWR_L3_CRoute_UHF_229
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: UHF_BatteryHandler_Cyclic ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Crypto/UHF/c/inc/UHF_BatteryHandler.h line 242 Requirement is satisfied here: UHF_TaskCyclicEvent ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Crypto/UHF/c/inc/UHF_Task.h line 222 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Crypto/UHF/c/test/swut/UHF_BatteryHandler.c.test line 340 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Crypto/UHF/c/test/swut/UHF_Task.c.test line 202
ICAS1::UHF-Master shall implement a cyclic task operable in High-Power (Normal) Mode with cycle period = 10 ms. ID: SWR_L3_CRoute_UHF_229 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
